metadata.title: CVE-2022-49026 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:e100: Fix possible use after free in e100_xmit_prepareIn e100_xmit_prepare(), if we can't map the skb, then return -ENOMEM, soe100_xmit_frame() will return NETDEV_TX_BUSY and the upper layer willresend the skb. But the skb is already freed, which will cause UAF bugwhen the upper layer resends the skb.Remove the harmful free.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
